article.author: Nick
article.body_1: The big red reset button was hit last evening on Monday night RAW. The storm known as Payback has washed away with its nonsensical stories and numerous Wrestlemania rematches. The next batch of feuds were revealed and we now have a sense of the general direction of the RAW brand going into Summer. It was a decent show saved by an entertaining main event. Letâ€™s get into it.
